Welcome to the Collective
Welcome to the North State Planning and Development Collective at California State University, Chico. 

            "The Collective" is a lead agency for planning, research and development needs across the University's 12-County service region and beyond.

Welcome to theNorth State Planning and Development CollectiveWelcome to the North State Planning and Development Collective at California State University, Chico. 
"The Collective" is a lead agency for planning, research and development needs across the University's 12-County service region and beyond.
For a list of Coronavirus Resources, please click here.About the CollectiveClick to learn moreHow We Can HelpClick to learn more about our servicesCOVID-19 Resources NewslettersCommunity Economic Resilience Fund (CERF)Welcome to theCenter for Economic DevelopmentThe Center for Economic Development is a division of the North State Planning and Development Collective at California State University, Chico. The Center provides regional leaders with accurate and timely information to address the socio-economic challenges and opportunities facing the region. About the CEDClick to learn more!How We Can HelpClick to learn more!EventsClick to learn more about our Events!Internship ProgramClick to learn more!Our PartnersBiomass Feasibility StudyWelcome to theGeographical Information CenterAbout the GICHow We Can HelpInternship ProgramContactRiver RestorationWelcome to theBroadband Consortia The Northeastern and Upstate California Connect Consortia, programs of the California Public Utilities Commission, are focused on improving broadband availability and performance within the region through information sharing, assessment of current broadband performance, incorporation of broadband intormation into local government planning, generating strategic broadband plans and more.  The Northeastern California Connect Consortium covers Butte, Modoc, Tehama, Lassen, Plumas, Shasta and Siskiyou counties.  The Upstate California Connect Consortium covers Colusa, Glenn and Lake counties. Working together, we can help bridge the digital divide.Northeastern California Connect ConsortiumUpstate California Connect Consortium
